message: Accept my generous offer and we can split the money fairly!
A fair split, but I want a slightly better deal!
Your offer is still too generous, Bob! I'll think of something better.
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more!
You're still trying to rip me off, Bob! I'll think of something better.
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger, and the money is getting scarcer!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I still think I can do better than this!
Fine, Bob. You got a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any younger, and I don't want to risk losing everything.
